description: These banana, blueberry and zucchini muffins are the perfect hidden veggie breakfast or snack.
keywords: Sweet muffin,Banana,Zucchini,Seafood free,Blueberry,Soy free,Tree nut free,Sesame free,Peanut free
name: Banana, Blueberry & Zucchini Muffins Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Pre-heat the oven to 180°C/160°C fan-forced and lightly grease a 12 cup muffin tin or line with muffin cases.
Place the grated zucchini in a clean dish towel, wrap and squeeze out as much moisture as possible.
Mix the oil, eggs, banana, honey, vanilla and milk in a large bowl. Sift in the flour, baking powder and cinnamon, stir well to combine.
Fold in the grated zucchini and blueberries and scoop batter into the muffin tin.
Bake for 20 minutes or until slightly golden and leave to cool for 10 minutes before serving.
